statistical_formats.r_rds: R data serialization format with factor levels preserved
statistical_formats.stata_dta: Stata dataset with variable and value labels

legal_data_considerations.violation_analysis: Filter by status variables before analyzing violations
legal_data_considerations.fine_analysis: Zero fines may be meaningful (no fine imposed)

variable_categories.violation_indicators: Variables starting with q30_, q31_, q53_, q56_, q57_

regression_analysis: Use robust standard errors for fine analysis
Consider log transformation for monetary variables
Filter by status variables to avoid bias
categorical_analysis: Use chi-square tests with Bonferroni correction
Account for legal exclusivity in multi-select variables
Consider ordinal nature of severity measures
time_series_analysis: Account for GDPR learning curve effects
Use appropriate trend tests for legal data
